results.name: Arithmetic derivative of even numbers: a(n) = n+2*A003415(n).
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (MAGMA) Ad:=func<h | h*(&+[Factorisation(h)[i][2]/Factorisation(h)[i][1]: i in [1..#Factorisation(h)]])>; [Ad(2*n): n in [1..60]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 22 2013
